thread.title: Football Player of the Week: Woodlan's Mitchell Van Brocklin
thread.title_full: Football Player of the Week: Woodlan's Mitchell Van Brocklin

title: Football Player of the Week: Woodlan's Mitchell Van Brocklin
text:
Football Player of the Week: Woodlan's Mitchell Van Brocklin 
By Dean Pantazi - 21 Alive October 9, 2015 Updated Oct 9, 2015 at 5:50 PM EDT 
WOODBURN, Ind. (21 Alive) - The 21 Alive Parkview Sports Medicine High School Football Player of the Week for Week 7 is Woodlan's Mitchell VanBrocklin. 
Mitchell last week at Lima Central Catholic ran for 154 yards and two touchdowns and scored a third touchdown on his first pass reception of the season. 
Digital Daily â€“ subscribe to our daily newsletter 
Mitchell went over the thousand yard mark in rushing with that performance and ran his touchdown total to 15. 
A good student as well as a good football player, Mitchell also does a solid job as a defensive end. 
For more on this story click on the video icon.
